scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npx terser "blog page.js" -o "dist/blog page.min.js" && npx terser "home page.js" -o "dist/home page.min.js" && npx terser "portfolio page.js" -o "dist/portfolio page.min.js" && npx terser "resume page.js" -o "dist/resume page.min.js" && npx cleancss "blog page.css" -o "dist/blog page.min.css" && npx cleancss "home page.css" -o "dist/home page.min.css" && npx cleancss "portfolio page.css" -o "dist/portfolio page.min.css" && npx cleancss "resume page.css" -o "dist/resume page.min.css" && npx html-minifier-terser blog.html -o dist/blog.min.html --minify-css true --minify-js true --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace && npx html-minifier-terser "home page.html" -o dist/home.min.html --minify-css true --minify-js true --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace && npx html-minifier-terser index.html -o dist/index.min.html --minify-css true --minify-js true --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace && npx html-minifier-terser portfolio.html -o dist/portfolio.min.html --minify-css true --minify-js true --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace && npx html-minifier-terser resume.html -o dist/resume.min.html --minify-css true --minify-js true --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace && cp -r assets dist/assets && cp favicon-32x32.png dist/ && cp apple-touch-icon.png dist/ && cp favicon-16x16.png dist/ && cp site.webmanifest dist/ && cp android-chrome-192x192.png dist/ && cp android-chrome-512x512.png dist/ && cp favicon.ico dist/
